FuncDef: Thedescriptioncommand is used to define an informational ASCII string associated with the policer control policy or post policer mapping policy. The string value can be defined or changed at any time when the policy exists.

ParaDef.Info: The description-string parameter defines the ASCII description string for the policer control policy. Allowed values are any string of up to 80 characters, 7-bit ASCII characters. If the string contains special characters (#, $, spaces, etc), the entire string must be enclosed within double quotes. ParamDefault: Default- None
